---
--- Generated by lvyuqiang
--- File name : nav_trigger.lua.txt
--- DateTime : 2022/05/17
--- Description : 碰撞盒触发器
---

local super = require "game/systems/trigger/model/visible_trigger"
local log = log
local lua_util = cs.LuaUtil
---@class collider_trigger
local trigger = class("collider_trigger", super)

---构造函数
---@private
function trigger:ctor(id, config_id, table_name)
    super.ctor(self, id, config_id, table_name)
end

function trigger:init()
    super.init(self)
    if self.target_go then
        self.collider = self.target_go:GetComponent(typeof(cs.BoxCollider))
        if lua_util.IsNull(self.collider) then
            log.error("collider_trigger has no collider component, id: ", self.id, ", config_id: ", self.config_id)
        end
    else
        log.error("collider_trigger target is nil, id: ", self.id, ", config_id: ", self.config_id)
    end
end

---dispose
---@public
function trigger:dispose()
    super.dispose(self)
    self.collider = nil
end

return trigger
